# GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/appEventScreenshots | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/appEventScreenshots ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots)

-  GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/appEventScreenshots 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/appEventScreenshots

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/appEventScreenshots
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots#query-parameters)

`fields[appEventScreenshots]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `fileSize, fileName, imageAsset, assetToken, uploadOperations, assetDeliveryState, appEventAssetType, appEventLocalization``limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200``fields[appEventLocalizations]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `locale, name, shortDescription, longDescription, appEvent, appEventScreenshots, appEventVideoClips``include``[string]`

 Value: `appEventLocalization`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventScreenshotsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventscreenshotsresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-appEventScreenshots#see-also)
